page.title: 01WELCOME TO HIGHAM FERRERS
page.content:
In the landscape of the twelve square kilometre block we have been given to study there are three main places; Higham Ferrers, Chelveston, Caldecote and a large rural area.
Higham Ferrers has a population of 5000. It is a very historical place with the church, a market cross, medieval and 17th century houses.
Chelveston is a small peaceful village near Higham Ferrers which has a population of 260.
Caldecote has a population of 40 and also has a small church. There is an old American air base near Caldecote.
Most of the land around this area is used for farming and the main industry is the manufacture of footwear.
